item.title: Case Studies
item.author: shawn.graham@carleton.ca (Dr. Shawn Graham)
item.description: Goals for this week this that the other thing Read No readings this week. However, look at the rich body of annotation you have. Use the readings and the annotations to help structure and support your Notebook case study. Do Write your case study that the other thing With tech work, if it doesn’t come together in about 30 minutes, it won’t come in an hour. So take a break.
